name: EffectEstimateType
title: EffectEstimateType
description: Whether the effect estimate is an absolute effect estimate (absolute difference) or a relative effect estimate (relative difference), and the specific type of effect estimate (eg relative risk or median difference).

concept.definition: relative risk (a type of relative effect estimate).
odds ratio (a type of relative effect estimate).
hazard ratio (a type of relative effect estimate).
absolute risk difference (a type of absolute effect estimate).
mean difference (a type of absolute effect estimate).
standardized mean difference (a type of absolute effect estimate).
median difference (a type of absolute effect estimate).
